text: Regex match even number of letters
I need to match an expression in python with regular expressions that only matches even number of letter occurances.

code:
# Even number of A's
AAA # no match
AA # match
fsfaAAasdf #match
sAfA  # match
sdAAewAsA # match
AeAiA  # no match

text: You are right - even number of A's SHOULD match.
EDIT2: If you down-vote my question - please comment on what the problem is.
I want to make it as clear and as useful as possible to people.
